description:
FOR 3 DAYS ONLY GET THIS COURSE AT $19 (ORIGINAL PRICE $99) SIGN UP NOW!!

ARE YOU READY TO CREATE A SUCCESSFUL YOUTUBE CHANNEL AND DON'T KNOW WHERE TO START? THIS CLASS WILL TEACH YOU EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW!

With Over a Billion Views Monthly, YouTube is a market space for anyone! Whether you want to make short films, web series, a food channel, or market your business, this class will teach you the tools you need!

With a 30 day money back guarantee you have nothing to lose but a lot to gain!

What you will learn in this class:

    1. What kind of cameras, lenses and equipment you can use to get your project done

    2. Every function within a camera (ISO, Aperture, Shutter Speed, Etc., Sensor Sizes, Etc.)

    3. Where to buy and rent cameras and/or equipment for cheap! How to get away with not purchasing a single thing!

    4. How to Generate Ideas

    5. Creating Unique content

    6. How to organize your content

    7. How to properly write a script! (Including FREE Screenwriting Software)

    8. Rules of Composition (Angles, Focal Lengths, Etc.)

    9. How to create a shot list for your YouTube Videos

    10. How to Cast for your project!

    11. How to cast professional actors/actress for free!

    12. How to prepare and shoot you videos!

    13. How to edit videos using FREE SOFTWARE

    14. Creating a Proper YouTube Channel and making your Channel look professional

    15. How to create YouTube Channel Art and effective Thumbnails, a trick that can gain you Thousands of Views!

    16. Effectively creating Titles and Descriptions â€“ A must for YouTube!

    17. Publishing Your Videos Properly

    18. Marketing your Video to gain Thousands of views!

    19. How to Marketing your Video for FREE!

    20. YouTube Analytics and how you can make the most of your channel!

    21. How to make money on YouTube!!!!!
title: Creating HIGH QUALITY YouTube Videos on a Low Budget!
